connections.name: Oona Marlow
connections.role: Astral Bazaar gear stallkeeper (rope, oil, chalk, cases); pays Meilin for quiet 'watch work.'
connections.tension: Low-drama work, but she sees too much. Mutual protection.

details.met: Meredin's network pointed me toward her stall when I needed work that didn't ask questions.
details.bond: She provides jobs, warnings, and pragmatic protection. I keep my boundaries clean and don't splash heat onto her neighbors.
details.iAskFor: Work leads, port warnings, discreet supplies, and a place to breathe.
details.theyAskFor: Contamination checks, quiet triage for her contacts, and discretion about what I see.

connections.name: Meredin Sandyfoot
connections.role: Quiet patron and fixer in/around the Burrows; provides 'coverage,' not ownership.
connections.tension: Provides coverage, but coverage has costs. Favors must close.

details.met: The people who needed discretion found me, and his name kept surfacing behind the introductions.
details.bond: He provides coverage for the Burrows' sick to reach capable hands without official questions. I provide follow-through and no sloppy messes.
details.iAskFor: Warnings, routing, and gaps in the net when I need to move.
details.theyAskFor: Off-books treatment for his people, and discretion about what I see.

connections.name: Kaito Starwell
connections.role: Dockside apothecary/diagnostician on the Rock of Bral; meticulous record-keeper.
connections.tension: Anchor and vulnerability. Pressure on his shop forces her hand.

details.theKnot: He's my anchor and my greatest vulnerability. If inspectors circle his shop, my choices get expensive fast.
details.heWants: Me to be alive and free. To stop before the pattern swallows me.
details.iWant: Him to stay safe. To not become leverage.
details.danger: Smith's Coster knows where he is. Every move I make could land on his doorstep.

connections.name: Cassian Starwell
connections.role: Helm-chaser and long-haul wanderer who left Bral to 'see the stars.'
connections.tension: His 'opportunities' come with invisible strings. Trust is complicated.

details.theKnot: He left Bral first to 'see the stars,' chasing helm-adjacent work. His letters stopped making sense, but I kept them anyway.
details.heWants: To help, to open doors, to share opportunities he's found out in the void.
details.iWant: To trust him. To believe his offers don't come with strings I can't see.
details.danger: His 'opportunities' often come with patrons, contracts, or favors attached. If he offers help, I treat it like a contract and read the fine print.

connections.name: Sera Quill
connections.role: Tidy clerk dosed by routine (tea/tonics); became an unintentional trail to the supply chain.
connections.tension: She became the trail to Smith's Coster. Now she's watched.

details.theKnot: She came to me tired in the wrong wayâ€”tremors, metal taste, fog that didn't match sleep. She became the trail that led to Smith's Coster.
details.sheWants: Safety without being treated like an object. A way to help that doesn't turn her into leverage.
details.iWant: Her to stay invisible. To never become the price of my momentum.
details.danger: Smith's Coster is following her, mapping her movements. If they decide she's useful, my choices get expensive.

connections.name: Bram Cale
connections.role: Inside contact who helped Meilin get into a Smith's Coster warehouse to steal the ledger page.
connections.tension: Helped steal the ledger page. Compromised. Could flip or vanish.

details.theKnot: He was terrified and owned by the system, but he wanted out badly enough to help me get inside.
details.heWants: An exit that doesn't look like betrayal until it's too late. Reassurance that he isn't already dead for helping me.
details.iWant: Him to stay quiet and stay safe. I can't promise either.
details.danger: He's compromised. He could flip, vanish, or be made an example. If he resurfaces, it's never good news.

connections.name: Elowen Pryce
connections.role: Smith's Coster field representative; delivers warnings and applies pressure in public spaces.
connections.tension: Patient pursuer. Wants the ledger page or silence.

details.sheBelieves: I'm a problem that can still be solved with the right pressure or the right example.
details.sheWants: The ledger page recovered or destroyed. My silence, my compliance, or my containment.
details.howSheOperates: Patient surveillance, public warnings delivered softly in crowds, and pressure on people adjacent to me. She makes pursuit feel like weather.

indirect.description: Pryce knows where Kaito is. Pressure point.
Pryce is mapping Sera's movements. Leverage.
Cassian's opportunities come from someone. Strings attached.
Meredin's network routes patients to Kaito. Shared exposure.
